response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value of $1,200,000, while still ensuring a fair profit for us. We are confident that this offer presents an attractive opportunity for both parties and would be delighted to facilitate the transaction if you choose to accept. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me directly. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
